src:
Digosipkan Gabung MU, Begini Status Transfer Erling Haaland yang sebenarnya
04 Nov 2019, 18:25 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Direktur Olahraga FC Salzburg, Christoph Freund angkat bicara terkait rumor bergabungnya Erling Braut Haaland ke Manchester United. Freund membantah kabar tersebut karena hingga saat ini ia belum menerima tawaran apapun untuk sang striker.
Haaland digosipkan bakal menjadi properti panas di bursa transfer yang akan datang. Striker berusia 19 tahun itu tampil sangat tajam di lini serang FC Salzburg musim ini dan mulai menarik perhatian publik paska mengemas hattrick di laga debut Liga Championsnya musim ini.
Nama Manchester United diberitakan menjadi tim yang paling bernafsu mendatangkan sang striker. Mereka dikabarkan akan mendatangkan Haaland di bulan Januari untuk menambal lini serang mereka yang tengah kekurangan tenaga.
Ketika dikonfirmasi mengenai kabar itu, Freund mengaku bahwa kabar itu hanya hoaks. "Itu [Haaland ke MU] tidak benar," ujar sang Direktur Olahraga kepada Manchester Evening News.

Baca komentar lengkap Freund di bawah ini.
text:
Rumored to Join MU, Here's the actual Erling Haaland Transfer Status
Nov 04 2019, 18:25 by Bola.net
Bola.net - FC Salzburg's sporting director Christoph Freund spoke up regarding rumors of Erling Braut Haaland joining Manchester United. Freund denied the news because until now he had not received any offer for the striker.
Haaland is rumored to be a hot property in the upcoming transfer market. The 19-year-old striker appeared very sharp in the attack line FC Salzburg this season and began to attract public attention after packing a hat trick in his Champions League debut match this season.
The name Manchester United is reported to be the most passionate team to bring in the striker. They are rumored to be bringing in Haaland in January to patch up their attack lines who are short of energy.
When confirmed about the news, Freund claimed that the news was only hoaks. "That [Haaland to MU] is not true," the Sports Director told the Manchester Evening News.

Read Freund's full comment below.
